The person would first need to connect the tiller to the tractor using the quick hitch, engage the PTO, set the depth control, and operate the tiller in a pass-and-back motion. They might also need to check for the slip clutch operation and compare the results to previous plowing. However, those steps may be considered subtasks of operating the tiller.
